title: 新人发问
author: 拽↙比
txt_content: 黄金武器的攻击力很厉害吗?                                                                          黄金工具的效率高吗.....                                                                      我知道耐久很低......

replies.author: KVIS
replies.txt_content: 又错版！！！！

replies.author: 小析
replies.txt_content:
1个小时发了4贴

厉害啊

replies.author: KVIS
replies.txt_content: 去问答区— —

replies.author: GAODADEYANLEI
replies.txt_content: 你可以弄一个全附魔的鱼保证比黄金剑厉害

replies.author: 小析
replies.txt_content: 黄金可以炫耀

replies.author: KVIS
replies.txt_content: 金剑攻击力=木剑

replies.author: q295613192
replies.txt_content: 伤害和铁的差不多

replies.author: KVIS
replies.txt_content: 金搞=速度超块耐久只有30多的石稿

效率可以
攻击和石头的差不多
耐久渣到爆....

replies.author: JUNS
replies.txt_content: - -！~那不是装饰品么

replies.author: KVIS
replies.txt_content: 金稿速度快耐久低，只能挖石稿挖的东西

replies.author: xiaobaicai
replies.txt_content: 还不如铁剑好

replies.author: shenwei123
replies.txt_content: 土豪我们做朋友吧
